title: Small collection of official WSL utilities akin to Cygwin
body: There are a bunch of small interop related problem areas that developers will over and over roll their own incompatible (and buggy) scripts to fix...

comments.body: WSL Ubuntu bash already has part of cygpath built in. If in cmd or PowerShell you cd to som directory and the type "bash", then that bash will open at the bash version (/mnt/***) of the path cmd or PowerShell was in.
